Body:
traces = []
def tracer(old_state, input, new_state):
    traces.append((old_state, input, new_state, None))

    def trace_outputs(output):
        traces.append((old_state, input, new_state, output))
    return trace_outputs
s = SampleObject()
s.setTrace(tracer)
s.go1()
self.assertEqual(traces, [('begin', 'go1', 'middle', None), ('begin', 'go1',
    'middle', 'out')])
s.go2()
self.assertEqual(traces, [('begin', 'go1', 'middle', None), ('begin', 'go1',
    'middle', 'out'), ('middle', 'go2', 'end', None), ('middle', 'go2',
    'end', 'out')])
s.setTrace(None)
s.back()
self.assertEqual(traces, [('begin', 'go1', 'middle', None), ('begin', 'go1',
    'middle', 'out'), ('middle', 'go2', 'end', None), ('middle', 'go2',
    'end', 'out')])
s.go2()
self.assertEqual(traces, [('begin', 'go1', 'middle', None), ('begin', 'go1',
    'middle', 'out'), ('middle', 'go2', 'end', None), ('middle', 'go2',
    'end', 'out')])
